item.title: How to create custom controls in .NET MAUI
item.description: .NET MAUI is a powerful cross-platform mobile app framework by Microsoft. It is a reliable feature-enriched option for developers of all types of mobile applications. Its community toolkit, XAML-based designing, and modern C# coding support stand out from MAUI among its competitors. One key feature it provides is the creation Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/how-to-create-custom-controls-in-net-maui/
